prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon with a celestial theme and a radiant aura.
Imagine a mythical creature that embodies creation and balance in the universe.
Show me a unique Pokemon that resembles a majestic horse with divine features.
Generate an elegant creature that has both strength and grace in its design.
Design a Pokemon that can control dimensions and is surrounded by light.
Give me a powerful Pokemon that represents the concept of time and space.
Make a Pokemon with a combination of colors that symbolize purity and divinity.

distinctive_features: Unique ring-like structure around its body
